answers.answer: Hello,this question is best answered by a pharmacist who is training in use of drugs and drug combinations.There is also a forum here called "ask the pharmacist" - you can get to it on the main page list of forums, which you may wish to try.Do you have any specific symptoms that you are concerned about?

question: what are the side affects of the combination of januvia 50 mg + pioglitazone hcl 30mg + metformin hcl 500mg?
title: Diabetes 2
